00012 void smooth_roll(void)
00013 {
00014     int8_t i, j;
00015 
00016     triangle();
00017     for (;;) {
00018         for (i = 2; i < 20; i++) {
00019             for (j = i; j < 20; j++) {
00020                 display_for(i);
00021                 rotate_right();
00022             }
00023             if (should_exit()) {
00024                 return;
00025             }
00026         }
00027         for (i = 19; i > 2; i--) {
00028             for (j = i; j < 20; j++) {
00029                 display_for(i);
00030                 rotate_right();
00031             }
00032             if (should_exit()) {
00033                 return;
00034             }
00035         }
00036     }
00037 }

00046 void fill_drain(void)
00047 {
00048     uint8_t x;
00049 
00050     clear(0);
00051     shift_right(MAX_INTENSITY);
00052     while (!should_exit()) {
00053         display_for(10);
00054         x = MAX_INTENSITY - peek_right();
00055         shift_right(x);
00056     }
00057 }

00063 void flash(void)
00064 {
00065     int8_t i;
00066 
00067     while(1) {
00068         for (i = 0; i <= MAX_INTENSITY; i++) {
00069             clear(i);
00070             display_for(3);
00071             if (should_exit()) {
00072                 return;
00073             }
00074         }
00075         for (i = MAX_INTENSITY; i >= 0; i--) {
00076             clear(i);
00077             display_for(3);
00078             if (should_exit()) {
00079                 return;
00080             }
00081         }
00082     }
00083 }
